channel.title: [Outdated] Timer, Name List, Card, and Role Bugs
channel.description:
####What happened? so much wrong happened in this game, the timer went negative, to the right you can see the names are all "player name 1" etc., my card art did not correspond with my role (gave me weegee for whatever reason, DONT KNOW IF THATS A GLITCH but usually it would give me the card for the role i was assigned) id like to point out i also had NO abilities, both day and night time.
####What was SUPPOSED to happen? well, the complete opposite of everything that happened up there, pretty self-explainatory in my screenshot
####Steps to reproduce: all the steps are pretty basic, i just joined a game and it was all broken. did nothing but say hello day 1 lol.
####Comments: Screenshot of all the glitches in one: http://i.imgur.com/eicYy25.png Pastebin with Change_Log: https://pastebin.com/RJp82Sbn

item.title: [Outdated] Timer, Name List, Card, and Role Bugs
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.source: [Outdated] Timer, Name List, Card, and Role Bugs

item.title: [Outdated] Timer, Name List, Card, and Role Bugs

item.description:
####What happened?
so much wrong happened in this game, the timer went negative, to the right you can see the names are all “player name 1” etc., my card art did not correspond with my role (gave me weegee for whatever reason, DONT KNOW IF THATS A GLITCH but usually it would give me the card for the role i was assigned) id like to point out i also had NO abilities, both day and night time.

####What was SUPPOSED to happen?
well, the complete opposite of everything that happened up there, pretty self-explainatory in my screenshot

####Steps to reproduce:
all the steps are pretty basic, i just joined a game and it was all broken. did nothing but say hello day 1 lol.

####Comments:
Screenshot of all the glitches in one: http://i.imgur.com/eicYy25.png
